attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are Management Companies out there that need investigating by the Government.There needs to be more Control of what they are doing. Some are doing nothing for  their money and many leaseholders are being exploited and paying maintenance year after year for what ? Perhaps just to get the grass cut.Some Councils look after their flats better than  some private ly owned ones.We need action on these Management Companies and now.Seek these people out and make them accept their responsibilities to us leaseholders.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
